name: Turkey With A Jetpack
description: This is one of my first games: any feedback on how I can improve is appreciated! You play as a turkey who, instead of being eaten for Thanksgiving, decides to steal a jetpack and live his own life. Dodge spikes and rotating saws to make it to the ends of the both levels.  Made for Week 1 of the Mental Health Game Jam. Length: 1-4 Minutes
